data.title: Simple Early A Main Dart
data.description: Use this lineup to quickly gain info on A Site with.

data.title: Recon Bolt For Left B Site / Front B Site
data.description: This is a useful arrow to have as an option to scan the left side of B Site, and the front side of B Site, that can be used situationally alongside other lineups throughout the Attacking half, depending on how you think the defending team could be playing B Site throughout the half.
